Team -

I just wrapped up a call with Fiserv regarding
merchant attrition and wanted to fill you all in
while it was still fresh in my mind

A mistake was made by us in early Q1 and we reported
more Large Merchants than we delivered
*The volume of Large Merchants has been reduced by
$532M, due to incorrect reporting.

We are going to work quickly to provide a formula
change to account for the attrition levels.

Please make sure all the numbers tied to volume are correct.
